message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm motivated to sell, $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
